name: Window subframe installed in correct location according to drawing provide. Window subframe bolts & dam ends are completely sealed.
Window panel is securely fixed in position and free of damage, protection film are applied
Window subframe perimeter is caulked as per drawings.
Hardware is installed correctly and funtioning well. Door and awning operation is good.
Flyscreens installed without damage. Flyscreen hardware installed and flyscreen operation is good.
